Class TaxiThread

java.lang.Object
  TaxiThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class TaxiThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class contains a thread that controls a specific taxi. It also contains the essential data unique to that taxi such as its id and assigned patrol area. A connetion to the controller is required via network. Controller must be started before this class will work. This class contains code that displays data on the TaxiUI GUI The following .java files are essential: Location, Taxi, DetArea, and TaxiUI.

Constructor Summary
TaxiThread(int id, java.lang.String IP)
          Sets up the controller's IP address and initializes the data array to build a blank location

Constructor Detail

TaxiThread

public TaxiThread(int id,
                  java.lang.String IP)
Sets up the controller's IP address and initializes the data array to build a blank location

Parameters:
id - id number and assigned patrol area for the taxi
IP - Controller's IP address.
Method Detail

getStatus

public int getStatus()
Gets status of the taxi.

Returns:
status integer.

run

public void run()
Thread run method. Allows multiple taxis to run at time same time. Moves the taxi form location to location. Runs until taxi is shut down Taxi moves to new locations avery 10 seconds and waits 40 seconds during passenger exchanges.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

stopTaxi

public void stopTaxi()
Called by GUI when "go out of service" is clicked. Takes cab out of service and sets stop to true. if patrolling.

flag

public void flag(int ew,
                 int ns)
Called by GUI when "Flag" is clicked. Purpose: Places cab in flag mode if patrolling.

Parameters:
ew - -Requested East-West destination.
ns - -Requested North-South destination.

call

public void call(Location r,
                 Location d)
Called by dispatcher (DisControl) to place the taxi in request mode (if patrolling).

Parameters:
r - -Requested origination.
d - -Requested destination.
